0.name: Standing Ovation
0.fullDesc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Guinaifen's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Blazing Welcome
0.fullDesc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Guinaifen's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Guinaifen's ATK to any adjacent enemies, with a {{3, percent}}% <u>base chance</u> to Burn the target and adjacent targets. When Burned, enemies will take a Fire DoT equal to <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Guinaifen's ATK at the beginning of each turn, lasting for {{5}} turn(s).
0.shortDesc: Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy and minor Fire DMG to adjacent enemies, with a high chance of <orangeStrong>Burning</orangeStrong> them.

0.name: Watch This Showstopper
0.fullDesc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong> of Guinaifen's ATK to all enemies. If the target enemy is currently inflicted with Burn, then their Burn status immediately produces DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of their original DMG.
0.shortDesc: Deals Fire DMG to all enemies. If the enemies are inflicted with Burn, the Burn status deals DMG 1 extra time.

0.name: Skill Showcase
0.fullDesc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals DMG for {{2}} time(s), dealing Fire DMG equal to {{1, percent}}% of Guinaifen's ATK to a random single enemy target each time, with a {{3, percent}}% <u>base chance</u> of inflicting Firekiss on them.
0.shortDesc: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals minor Fire DMG to a single target while applying <orangeStrong>Firekiss</orangeStrong>, with a total of 4 Bounces.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

0.name: High Poles
0.fullDesc: Basic ATK has a {{1, percent}}% base chance of inflicting an enemy with a Burn, equivalent to that of Skill.

0.name: Bladed Hoop
0.fullDesc: When the battle begins, Guinaifen's action is advanced forward by {{1, percent}}%.

0.name: Walking on Knives
0.fullDesc: Deals {{1, percent}}% more DMG to Burned enemies.

1.name: Slurping Noodles During Handstand
1.desc: When Skill is used, there is a {{1, percent}}% base chance to reduce the attacked target enemy's Effect RES by {{2, percent}}% for {{3}} turn(s).

2.name: Brushing Teeth While Whistling
2.desc: When an enemy target is being Burned, the DMG multiplier of the Burn status applied by her Basic ATK or Skill increases by {{1, percent}}%.

3.name: Smashing Boulder on Chest
3.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

4.name: Blocking Pike with Neck
4.desc: Every time the Burn status inflicted by Guinaifen causes DMG, Guinaifen regenerates {{1}} Energy.

5.name: Swallowing Sword to Stomach
5.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

6.name: Catching Bullet with Hands
6.desc: Increases the stackable Firekiss count by {{1}}.
